result.execSummary:
The defendant Keith Jerome Adkins Grender was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Keith Jerome Adkins Grender is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Keith Jerome Adkins Grender was found guilty of Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: 60 days to pay or set up a payment plan with Clerk of Courts.  Ct. 2 DISMISSED.

Copy of JOC mailed to defendant at 8110 Blakton Road #203, returned not deliverable as addressed unable to forward.

Defendant Keith Jerome Adkins Grender in court with attorney Peter A. Bartelt.  Jane E. Kohlwey appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Rights/Elements.  Defendant pled no contest to Ct. 2.  Court found guilty.  Judgment was entered.  Ct. 1 Dimissed.  On Ct. 2, Court sentenced defendant to pay $443.00 costs.  In 15TR2582 a stip was filed. 15TR3360  and 15TR2862 dismissed.  Must sumbit DNA sample. No jail credit.
Authorization to Appear and Act filed by attorney Bartelt

Attorney Peter A. Bartelt appeared. Jane E. Kohlwey appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Authorization to Appear and Act filed by attorney Bartelt.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for January 14, 2016 at 02:45 pm.

Defendant Keith Jerome Adkins Grender not in Court.  Troy D Cross appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  New date set.  Return date scheduled for November 9, 2015 at 02:45 pm.

Defendant, Keith Jerome Adkins Grender, appeared. Jane E. Kohlwey appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  $200.00 signature bond.  Not guilty pleas entered on 15TR2582, 15TR2862, & 15TR3360.  Standard misd. conditions.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 24, 2015 at 03:00 pm.  Return date scheduled for September 18, 2015 at 02:45 pm.
